plot: One year after the fight with the Innovators, a new terrorist organization called the Detectors threatens the world using LBXs. Ban joins up with new and old friends to stop the Detectors.
ending_theme: "Umare Kawattemo Boku de Ii yo" by Hiroki Maekawa (eps 35-45)
"Chikyū no kizuna" (地球の絆) by Dream5 (eps 46-57)
"Save the World" by Mike & Andrew Twining
